query.mssql: CREATE TABLE {0} ( Id BIGINT, StartDate NVARCHAR(MAX), EndDate NVARCHAR(MAX), Substitute NVARCHAR(MAX), Substitutable NVARCHAR(MAX), Description NVARCHAR(MAX), IsSystemSubstitution NVARCHAR(MAX), IsNeedDelegateStrictAccess NVARCHAR(MAX), ReportSessionId NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL );
query.postgres: create table {0} ( Id bigint, StartDate citext, EndDate citext, Substitute citext, Substitutable citext, Description citext, IsSystemSubstitution citext, IsNeedDelegateStrictAccess citext, ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL )

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_ListSubstitutionsReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
